package.name: Olark_Chatbox
package.summary: Olark Live Chat with CartSaver for Magento
package.description:
Be your customers' hero. Nothing answers customers or saves the sale faster than Olark live chat.
With CartSaver for Magento, see in real-time exactly what your customer do on your Magento store and then take action. End abandoned shopping carts.
Be their favorite salesperson as you can follow along as your customers add and remove items from their shopping carts, so you can talk to them about what they are buying.
Over 10,000 customers rely on Olark to make their customers happier and buying more.
package.notes: Fixes a bug where price formatting could cause errors in some circumstances.
